title: OMI_seat glTF Node Extension
description: Parameters describing a seat for a character.

back.description: Three number array defining the seat position corresponding to the character's back position limit in local space.

foot.description: Three number array defining the seat position corresponding to the character's feet position limit in local space.

knee.description: Three number array defining the seat position corresponding to the character's knee base position in local space.

angle.description: The angle between the spine and back-knee line in radians.
